content: after the success of our pandemonium cal we surprised our group with a baby version just like the pandemonium blanket this version was released twice a week for six weeks the blanket was designed to use up your stash so that everyone could join in for this reason there is no information on gauge/hook size/yarn etc everyone used whatever they had to hand for a rough idea of size we used dk yarn and a 4mm hook which resulted in a blanket measuring approximately 30 x 35 inches using around 500g of yarn
